alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Newport News; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:09PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern York , the City of Poquoson, the City of Hampton and the City of Newport News through 400 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Eustis to Northampton. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hampton, Langley AFB, Northampton and Tabb around 315 PM EDT. Patrick Henry Field and Lee Hall around 325 PM EDT. Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences around 335 PM EDT. Seaford and Gloucester Point around 340 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Lackey, Oriana, Hilton Village, Dare, Newport News Golf Course, Oyster Point, Messick, Hornsbyville, Harris Grove and Menchville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for southeastern Virginia.
